testimonial.title: Projects (CASE STUDIES)
testimonial.subtitle: Selected Projects
testimonial.text1: Development of a plant-material extraction method aimed at isolating a thermolabile compound for the cosmetics industry. Preparation and optimisation of the process to obtain a product with a minimum purity of 95%.
testimonial.text2: We developed one of the stages of the synthesis and purification of a biologically active compound, optimised it, and improved the overall yield of the entire 5-step process by 12 pp.
testimonial.text3: Extraction of phenolic compounds from plant material – development of a pilot-scale technology.
testimonial.text4: Synthesis and crystallization of a new API – development of a complete laboratory process and implementation documentation.
testimonial.text6: Development of production methods for inorganic selenium compounds.
testimonial.text7: Management of a project concerning the sublimation of molybdenum oxide.
testimonial.text8: Production of an ecological candy batch.
testimonial.text9: Development of complete production lines for inorganic compounds.
testimonial.text10: Research on obtaining materials with an appropriate particle-size distribution.
about.title: Our Motivation
about.text1: We are a team of people with experience in developing and implementing technologies for the chemical industry and related sectors.
about.text2: Our goal is to combine scientific knowledge with industrial practice to create solutions that genuinely increase the efficiency and safety of processes.
about.text3: Our team can be described with the word balance. We are a combination of youth and maturity, calmness and experience, as well as ambition and continuous effort.
about.text4: Among our members are employees with over 10 years of academic experience, over 20 years in industry, as well as aspiring young individuals who already have significant experience. The result of combining such substrates is a team whose ambition is to deliver solutions for Polish industry while developing, learning, and expanding horizons. We collaborate with universities and institutes across Poland. We also engage in international cooperation.
about.text5: We are the type of people who get things done — although we love the journey toward the goal, we always complete our tasks. Solving many problems has allowed us to clarify an operating scheme that consistently delivers excellent results. If you are not yet using our services, try applying our method to your own problem: we dive into the topic, test hypotheses, guide the solution and create the project, confirm the assumptions during scaling, and implement.
services.title: LubTech Competence Map
services.subtitle: See how we combine scientific knowledge, process technology, and engineering in practice.
services.processes_desc:
We prepare pathways for organic and inorganic synthesis,
We optimize parameters to increase yield and product purity,
We design multi-step and integrated processes,
We perform multicomponent separations: purification on preparative chromatographic columns, cooling crystallization, sublimation, LLE, SLE, SFE, Soxhlet extraction, fractional distillation, azeotropic distillation, vacuum distillation, steam distillation, hydrodistillation, as well as solvent drying and recovery.
services.solutions_desc:
We prepare conceptual and technological designs of equipment,
We design complete industrial production lines,
We design chemical production halls,
We select materials and operating parameters,
We prepare PFD and P&ID process diagrams,
We advise on modernization, implementation, and commissioning of production lines designed by us,
We support obtaining environmental permits.
services.formulations_desc:
For the cosmetics, pharmaceutical, fertilizer, and feed industries,
We develop and optimize formulations based on client guidelines,
We perform stability and compatibility tests,
We develop manufacturing technologies and prepare technological documentation.
services.rd_desc:
We prepare and guide teams through literature reviews,
We offer research and support for scientific projects, grant proposals, and expert panels,
We perform analyses and reports: GCMS, 1H, 13C NMR, PSD.
